articles.description: Just 15 customers are now affected in areas such as Guildford, Woking and Walton
articles.content: A number of power cuts are affecting homes in Surrey today (Saturday, December 10) amid freezing temperatures across the county. Operator UK Power Networks is reporting problems in a number of differ… [+966 chars]

articles.author: Kate Lally
articles.title: Argos £45 blanket that 'keeps you warm all night' for less than 3p - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Shoppers have been praising the item online
articles.content:
As the weather is only turning colder and colder, and energy prices are going up, many of us are trying to find cheaper alternatives to stay warm and comfortable.
